name: vscode-xml
description: XML Language Support by Red Hat
author: Red Hat

xml.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the XML language server.

xml.logs.client.description: Should the server log to client output.

xml.format.preserveAttributeLineBreaks.markdownDescription: Preserve line breaks that appear before and after attributes. This setting is overridden if `#xml.format.splitAttributes#` is set to `true`.

xml.format.splitAttributes.description: Split multiple attributes each onto a new line.

xml.format.joinCDATALines.description: Join lines in a CDATA tag's content.

xml.format.spaceBeforeEmptyCloseTag.description:
Insert space before end of self closing tag. 
Example:
  <tag/> -> <tag />

xml.format.joinContentLines.description: Normalize the whitespace of content inside an element. Newlines and excess whitespace are removed.

xml.format.preserveEmptyContent.description: Preserve empty content/whitespace in a tag.

xml.format.preservedNewlines.description: Preserve new lines that separate tags. The value represents the maximum number of new lines per section. A value of 0 removes all new lines.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Use preferred quote style set by `xml.preferences.quoteStyle` when formatting.
xml.format.enforceQuoteStyle.markdownDescription: Enforce `preferred` quote style (set by `#xml.preferences.quoteStyle#`) or `ignore` quote style when formatting. Default is `ignore`

xml.preferences.quoteStyle.markdownDescription: Preferred quote style to use for completion: `single` quotes, `double` quotes.

systemId.description: The path or URL to the XML schema (XSD or DTD).

pattern.description:
File glob pattern. Example: **/*.Format.ps1xml

More information on the glob syntax: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/io/fileOps.html#glob
pattern.markdownDescription:
File glob pattern. Example: `**/*.Format.ps1xml`

More information on the glob syntax: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/io/fileOps.html#glob

xml.completion.autoCloseTags.description:
Enable/disable autoclosing of XML tags. 

IMPORTANT: Turn off editor.autoClosingTags for this to work.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Documentation comes from the `xs:documentation` and `xs:appinfo` elements.
xml.preferences.showSchemaDocumentationT.description: Specifies the source of the XML schema documentation displayed on hover and completion.

xml.java.home.description:
Specifies the folder path to the JDK (8 or more recent) used to launch the XML Language Server.
On Windows, backslashes must be escaped, i.e.
"xml.java.home": "C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jdk1.8.0_161"

xml.server.vmargs.description: Specifies extra VM arguments used to launch the XML Language Server. Eg. use `-Xmx1G  -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:+UseStringDeduplication` to bypass class verification, increase the heap size to 1GB and enable String deduplication with the G1 Garbage collector.

xml.server.workDir.description: Set a custom folder path for cached XML Schemas. An absolute path is expected, although the ~ prefix (for the user home directory) is supported.

xml.validation.noGrammar.description: The message severity when a document has no associated grammar.

xml.validation.schema.description: Enable/disable schema based validation. Ignored if "xml.validation.enabled": false.

xml.validation.disallowDocTypeDecl.description: Enable/disable if a fatal error is thrown if the incoming document contains a DOCTYPE declaration.

xml.symbols.enabled.description: Enable/disable document symbols (Outline). No symbols are given if `"xml.symbol.enabled": false`.

xml.symbols.excluded.description:
Disable document symbols (Outline) for the given file name patterns. Updating file name patterns does not automatically reload the Outline view for the relevant file(s). Each file must either be reopened or changed, in order to trigger an Outline view reload.

Example:
[
 "**/*LargeFile.xml"
]

xml.symbols.maxItemsComputed.description: The maximum number of outline symbols and folding regions computed (limited for performance reasons).
